item.title: 在获得奖牌的女摔跤手、家长以及以男性为主的教练和管理人员的支持下，女子摔跤已成为全国发展最快的高中体育项目，他们认为女子摔跤是必要的，也是一个平等的问题。
item.description:
Girls’ wrestling has become the fastest-growing high school sport in the country, bolstered by medal-winning female wrestlers, parents and the male-dominated ranks of coaches and administrators who saw it as a necessity and a matter of equality. https://t.co/qXHlgSsenI pic.twitter.com/NUgCaak72f

— AP Sports (@AP_Sports) March 14, 2024

item.title: 新奥尔良市警察局长说，在新奥尔良老旧的警察总部，老鼠钻进了没收的大麻，啃食证据，因为大楼已被霉菌和蟑螂占据。
item.description:
Rats have gotten into confiscated pot at New Orleans’ aging police headquarters, munching the evidence as the building is taken over by mold and cockroaches, said the city’s police chief. pic.twitter.com/zG6fEPiZGM

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在周三早些时候接受采访时表示，莫斯科已准备好在 "俄罗斯国家的存在 "受到威胁时使用核武器。
item.description:
In an interview released early Wednesday, Vladimir Putin said that Moscow is ready to use nuclear weapons in case of a threat to “the existence of the Russian state.”

This comes as he's all but certain to win another six-year term going into the upcoming presidential election. pic.twitter.com/KngoRu3VJL

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 13, 2024

item.title: TikTok 再次发现自己的处境岌岌可危，因为华盛顿的立法者们正在推进一项可能导致在全国范围内禁止该平台的法案。以下是最新消息。
item.description:
TikTok once again finds itself in a precarious position as lawmakers in Washington move forward with a bill that could lead to a nationwide ban on the platform. Here’s the latest. pic.twitter.com/0tE6GZPS7P

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 13, 2024
